title: Water Soluble Marking Pen, Blue
description: This water soluble marking pen is the perfect accessory for marking on cloth for all your sewing and crafting needs. Always test marking pen on exact fabrics. Can be removed with water, damp cloth, or sponge. Instructions are do not iron over marks or launder item before removing them with water. This could set the marks if they are not completely removed. Not recommended for dry clean only fabrics. Available in blue color.
